titles.title: Erie Canalway National Heritage Reauthorization Act
Erie Canalway National Heritage Reauthorization Act
A bill to reauthorize the Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Erie Canalway National Heritage Reauthorization Act
This bill increases the maximum amount of funding that may be authorized for the Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor in the state of New York and extends the authority of the Department of the Interior to provide financial assistance for the corridor through FY2037.
